CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 11, 1970, page 15, reads: "Wedding Toast - Mr. and Mrs. James Michael Lee drink a wedding toast following their recent ceremony in home of the bride's grandparents, Mr. and Mrs. Percy Caldwell in St. Clair Village. The bride is the former Nina Lee Hilton. The groom in the son of Mr. and Mrs. Robert Lee. The Rev. Mr. Carter of South Hills Baptist Church administered the vows. The bride was attended by her sister and the groom's brother was best man. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four men, including groom, James Michael Lee, five women, including bride, Nina Lee wearing wedding dress with horizontally striped long lace sleeves, and two boys, in interior with large painting in background for Lee Hilton wedding
